content.rendered:
A Companion to the book that changes lives

In this companion to Way of the Peaceful Warrior, Dan Millman sheds new light on ancient wisdom. Over the years, readers have asked many compelling questions about mysterious elements in his bestselling classic. In this powerful new work, Dan has selected 100 key passages and added incisive commentaries to clarify the timeless teachings of his old mentor, Socrates. With practical wisdom gained over the past three decades, Dan shares fresh insights that readers can apply directly to their everyday lives.

Wisdom of the Peaceful Warrior speaks to all adventurous souls seeking a deeper understanding of life. For Dan Millman’s loyal readers as well as those new to his work, this book reveals how to live each day with a peaceful heart and a warrior spirit.
